codeList:
# Download the latest docker-compose.yaml
wget https://github.com/milvus-io/milvus/releases/download/v2.6.0/milvus-standalone-docker-compose.yml -O docker-compose.yaml
...
standalone:
  container_name: milvus-standalone
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.5.16
docker compose down
docker compose up -d
docker compose ps
...
standalone:
  container_name: milvus-standalone
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.0
docker compose down
docker compose up -d
# Check container status
docker compose ps

# Check Milvus version
docker compose logs standalone | grep "version"
headingContent: Upgrade Milvus Standalone with Docker Compose

anchorList.label: Upgrade Milvus Standalone with Docker Compose
